title: Indie Rock Ambience (Royalty Free Music)
description: Unleash the emotional and immersive power of live music in your game with Indie Rock Ambience!
longDescription:
- 14 Stunning Tracks: Over 25 minutes of high-quality audio, crafted for diverse moods and scenes.


- Studio-grade Quality: 24bit/48khz WAV files ensure the best sound performance.

- Each title includes bpm, allowing seamless loop creation in your middleware.


-9 melodic themes across 14 tracks, to add depth to your storytelling. Tracks are divided into Time-of-Day, Location and mini game themes but can be used however you like!


Featuring:

- Live Instruments: Electric & acoustic guitar, banjo, bass, Upright Piano, synthesizers, and percussion. 


- Tracks ranging from:

 - Calm, placid ambient pieces.

 - Ominous, atmospheric soundscapes.

 - Epic, high-energy post-rock bangers.


A Listen-Only Version of the OST can be found here:


https://youtu.be/8nrJiYNGOP4
